objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1D3557'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2B4570'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGrad' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#A8DADC'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E6EFF1'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#accentGrad)'/><g opacity='0.1' fill='#ffffff'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='10'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='10'/><circle cx='300' cy='300' r='10'/><circle cx='400' cy='400' r='10'/><circle cx='500' cy='500' r='10'/><circle cx='600' cy='600' r='10'/><circle cx='700' cy='700' r='10'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='10'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='10'/><circle cx='1000' cy='1000' r='10'/></g><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#EEEEEE' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M 300,0 L 600,300 L 900,0' stroke='#FFD166' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M 0,300 L 300,600 L 0,900' stroke='#FFD166' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Water Resistant Design
• 14 Pockets & 3 Compartments
• Fits Up to 16" Laptop
• Expandable +8L Space

Designed for work days
and weekend adventures

product_details.description:
• Crafted with reverse coated polyester and microfibre. 
  • Water resistant. 
  • 14 pockets. 3 compartments. Designed to organise your work days and staycations. 
  • Front compartment comes with a retractable key holder, large slip pockets, pen pockets and a zippered pocket. 
  • Main compartment opens flat, to give you full access to your items. 
  • Comes with a spill-proof pocket for your toiletries. 
  • Elastic slip pockets along the walls of your backpack. 
  • Zippered mesh storage compartment makes room for your weekend staycation. 
  • Comes with an expansion system, which you can unzip to get an additional 8L of packing space. 
  • Shock-proof tech compartment that opens flat and protects your tech from those accidental drops. Fits up to a 16” laptop and an 11” iPad Pro. 
  • Contoured bottle pocket on the side for your water bottle/umbrella.
  • Quick access zippered pocket at the top. 
  • Hidden passport pocket at the back. 
  • Padded shoulder straps designed for all day comfort. 
  • Luggage sleeve that secures to any Mokobara luggage. 
  • Dedicated rain cover compartment at the bottom. Use the rain cover to protect your Mokobara from the rains.
  • Size - 44 x 29 x 23 cm

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and professional layout with a diagonally split background that blends a deep blue gradient on the left with a cool aqua gradient on the right. The visual style communicates reliability and innovation, reinforced with subtle geometric lines and a soft radial circle impression. A high-resolution product image of a backpack is prominently placed to the right. Eye-catching, bold typographic elements are arranged on the left side: the primary headline (`heading`) gives the product name using large, attention-grabbing white text. A vibrant subheading (`subheading`) below highlights the backpack's standout capacity in bright yellow. Feature specifications are listed beneath in a clean, light-colored font (`description`), followed by a stylish tagline (`tagline`) in dual-toned blue. A large, bold price (`price`) anchors the lower section, and a yellow rectangular button (`cta_background`) with dark blue text (`cta`) invites immediate action. Overall, the composition balances visual impact with informative clarity.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: `#1D3557`
- Sky Blue: `#A8DADC`
- Soft Off-White: `#E6EFF1`
- Bright Yellow: `#FFD166`
- Rich Blue Gradient: `#2B4570`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a stylish backpack predominantly in a deep navy blue color (#2C3E50), giving it a modern, professional appearance. The large, subtly glossy black monogram print (#1B1B1B) across the front blends smoothly into the fabric, adding visual depth without overpowering the design. A bold splash of contrast is seen in the bright mustard yellow handle accent (#F4B400), which draws the eye and adds a dynamic, energetic touch. The black straps (#000000) provide a neutral balance. This thoughtfully harmonized palette of navy, black, and yellow can be extended into advertisement banners to reflect the product's sleek yet vibrant identity.
